Source_3.value: Sandy loam soil from kale field

Free_Text.value: Isolated from one of six surface soil samples (0-5 cm depth, diameter 2.1 cm) taken 26 November 2001 within one square meter from an organic grown curly kale field (Brasica olearacea acephala) at Møn, Teglværksvej 50, Stege, Denmark. The field is a sandy loam (pH 7.0).
